snippet.title: Camper Van: Make It Home Gameplay Trailer - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Watch new gameplay from Malapata Studios' cosy camper van puzzler, which debuted at the Convergence Showcase. Decorate and organise the camper van of your dreams! Embark on a journey of self-discovery as you build your own home-on-wheels, using a combination of creative block organisation puzzles and relaxing interior design. Make your heart feel at ease and your camper van feel like home.

Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2843190

#convergenceshow #indiegame
